Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Menopause \Men"o*pause\, n. [Gr. mh`n month + ? to cause to cease. See {Menses}.] (Med.) The period of natural cessation of menstruation. See {Change of life}, under {Change}. [1913 Webster]
menopause n : the time in a woman's life in which the menstrual cycle ends [syn: {climacteric}, {change of life}]
